participant_1.background:

content.text: I love spending time with my grandparents. I miss them so much
I miss my grandmother too. She was the best cook
My grandfather was a mechanic and he taught me a lot about fixing cars
That's so cool! I have a best friend from out of town
I wish I had a best friend. I'm an only child
I like to serve my community. I volunteer at a local soup kitchen
That's awesome! I'm an electrician and I love my job
I'm a soccer mom and I love my kids so much
I have a golden retriever named Buddy. He's the best dog ever
I love sunflowers. They're my favorite flower
I love Justin Bieber too. He's my favorite artist
I'm glad we have so much in common. Do you want to be friends?
Sure! I'd love to be friends
